sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM ErrorLog WHERE CAST(CreatedDate AS DATE) < DATEADD(DAY, -@{variables('ArchiveDays')}, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))

text.value: DELETE FROM ErrorLog WHERE CreatedDate < DATEADD(DAY, -@{variables('ArchiveDays')}, GETDATE())
